smart_goals.description: Reduce HbA1c from 7.8% to below 7% within 4 weeks by maintaining fasting glucose between 80-130 mg/dL and post-meal readings under 180 mg/dL through daily blood glucose monitoring and logging
Lose 20-25 pounds over the next 3 months by following a balanced nutrition plan with 45-60 grams of carbs per meal, paired with lean protein and healthy fats, targeting a weight of 160-165 lbs
Complete at least 150 minutes of moderate exercise (brisk walking or swimming) per week, plus two sessions of light strength training, tracking activity minutes daily
Reduce LDL cholesterol from 120 mg/dL to below 100 mg/dL within 3 months by consuming omega-3-rich foods (salmon and walnuts) at least 3 times per week
Perform daily foot checks every evening before bed to monitor for cuts or sores, maintaining a log of any concerning findings
Reduce blood pressure from 135/85 to below 130/80 mmHg within 4 weeks through regular exercise and medication compliance
